segments.text: How irresponsible is that woman, not even checking the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out, ruining the floor and everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are up to no good, stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is on a stool that's about to topple over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They think they can sneak around without consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, expecting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is what happens when parents don't watch their kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinets are inviting trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's wearing an apron and still missing this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks nice, but inside it's a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this nonsense now.
segments.speaker: PAR
